forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with light rain possible. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with light rain possible. Low 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
